summary: Provides a suite of unit tests that verify a nested‑key projection helper, ensuring it can correctly locate, extract, or project values from deeply nested dictionaries and lists under various conditions such as absent keys, out‑of‑range list indices, multi‑level structures, and partial data fixes.
business_intent: Validate the reliability of the nested‑key extraction utility used in DynamoDB model handling, preventing errors when accessing complex data structures in the application.
